title: Guillermo Szeszurak
text:
Guillermo Szeszurak (born October 16, 1971 in <a href="Buenos%20Aires">Buenos Aires</a>) is a former <a href="Argentina">Argentine</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Szeszurak joined <a href="Club%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20River%20Plate">River Plate</a>. He made debut in the season 1989/90 for the <a href="Excursionistas">Excursionistas</a>.
Szeszurak also played for <a href="Club%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Los%20Andes">Los Andes</a>, <a href="Deportivo%20Laferrere">Laferrere</a> in Argentina and <a href="F.C.%20Felgueiras">F.C. Felgueiras</a> in <a href="Portugal">Portugal</a>.
